title: and secondary school (RE1
clause_text: and secondary school (RE1.2), the building or part thereof intended for the school use shall be handed over free of cost and charge to the Corporation. Thereafter, the land may be allowed to be redeveloped with the full permissible FSI of the plot according to this Regulation
section: Development of reservation in Redevelopment for Rehabilitation of Slum Dwellers under Regulation No. 33(10)
